title: Ticket #519: chirp_set_attr should eval the rhs
description:
Currently, when chirp sets a job attribute, it treats the value as a literal. So, you can chirp set_attr foo 7. In order to increment an existing attribute, you must do two non-atomic operations, a get then a set. If chirp set_attr evaled the rhs, then we could do this in one operation:

chirp set_attr foo "foo + 1"
